Question
========

Given a sample with outcomes 7, 11, 5, 20, 18 and 17, the sample variance is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 32.33
* 38.8
* 5.69
* 6.23

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 32.33: Incorrect
* 38.8: Correct
* 5.69: Incorrect
* 6.23: Incorrect
